website_summaries.verdict: Surefire way to remove smudges, fingerprints, and germs.
pros: Lower moisture level than regular wipes so they won't damage your phone
One wipe will clean your phone and another small item, like eyeglasses
Owners love that they can store two or three in laptop bags, purses, and suitcases
Used by aircraft manufacturers and Ivy League schools to clean instruments
cons: A few complain that a small amount of residue is left on the screen

customer_reviews.title: Almost completely dried out
customer_reviews.text: My work provides these to clean our laptops and phones and they are beyond fantastic when fresh. Unfortunately the box I ordered for home off Amazon is barely moist. There is definitely some moisture but it's on the edge of being completely bad where it could either barely clean or create glass scratches depending on the dust. This is the first time I've not just ordered the cheapest electronics wipes for myself (which somehow always come super fresh) and I'm disappointed it arrived in a barely usable state.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Professional performance!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered iCloth Screen Cleaning Wipes on my job with a major airline. My company started supplying this product to crew members to clean our company supplied tablets and flight deck avionics. I was so impressed with the performance that I purchased my own personal supply! I use iCloth for cleaning our iPhones, television screens and anything else that a clean streak free surface is desired.This product thoroughly cleans without leaving a residue or streaking and they don't scratch or damage. I highly recommend this product for high performance cleaning of delicate surfaces and avionics!
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Not moist enough to clean anything more than a minor smudge
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. These tiny wipes aren't moist enough IMO and don't cut through anything more than a fingerprint that may have gotten on your screen. I actually tried to use these as an eyeglass cleaner and the same issue occurs plus it leaves a residue that basically means it smears anything around as oppose to cleaning it. Simply put, these wipes are barely moist enough to clean the dust and finger prints that get on glasses.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tomenga

customer_reviews.title: Love wipes but a problem
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like putting in negative reviews so I’ll be as kind as I can be. I love these wipes. I have been buying them for a while. Even a box I bought years ago I thought they would be dry but that was not the case. We used those up and I bought the new box. I do love these wipes; however, a lot of them are totally dry. Out of five wipes only two are moist. In this day and age that I’m sterilizing everything I was counting on these wipes to clean my computer, phones and iPads. Half the box is dry.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Baldor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Packets, but not moist enough
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited about finding Cloth Small Lens Screen Cleaning Wipes, Box of 100 which in my opinion are convenient packets in you get 100, but they are NOT moist enough. I found them to be to try and you have to use several to clean a small screen. Not sure if they sent me old ones or if they had dried about, but I found these to be dry and not wet enough for cleaning. They were not quite what I hope and I wish they would make them moistened more for cleaning dirt and grime.
customer_reviews.author: Bottm4UBoy

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for certain touch screens. They've reformulated the product at some point between 2018 and 2019. It doesn't wipe as cleanly as it did before. There's clear streaks leftover. Also, the amount of isopropyl alcohol seems to have gone up, which doesn't make me comfortable choosing these wipes for every day screen cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Dry and no return available.
customer_reviews.text: Were died out and didn’t clean lenses or screens. To add insult to injury, Amazon provided no “return” or “contact us” button to effect a return.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: These work alright but I can’t say I’m in love with them.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and is packaged quite attractively. But even though my Mom loves them, I think they could do a better job of keeping your phone screen clean for a while after using them. And they are a bit pricey I think. But other than that they do work fairly well. I still see some smearing after use. They are incredibly easy to use, and are lating quite a while, so maybe I am judging them a ittle harshly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Malicoat

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks and residue.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes were a disappointment. One thing they are not alcohol free and they always leave streaks and residue making them down right useless without using a microfiber cloth. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C. Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I was using Antec's wipes before this but they don't seem to sell them anymore so I decided to try this iCloth version. Right off the bat you can tell that these aren't as "clean" as the Antec version since this wipe leaves a small amount of residue behind and doesn't clean as fast. They are decent enough and get the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: More dry than wet
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are more dry and requires more than one just to wipe iPhone. Feels like package has been sitting on shelf for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I got a bad batch!
customer_reviews.text: Almost dry and doesn't really clean, you'll need to push really hard which is not something you want to do with these devices.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Handy to keep in the case
customer_reviews.text: I work for a not-for-profit and we recently ordered IPads for our Committee members to use to save on paper and increase efficiency at meetings. I find the ICloths work well in cleaning. I found a cover with credit-card pockets and these fit right in so our members can clean the screen as the meeting ends. We also use them in the office for cleaning the touch-screen on our all-in-one printer. When we clean the printer screen we also use the same cloth for our SmartPhones (x3). Works great!
customer_reviews.author: DenverDen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Price is great for the number of wipes, and they are perfect for my Macbook, iPhone, iPad, and even my kid's glasses and video game discs (I'm not sure if they're recommended for discs, but I use them, and it seems fine, haven't scratched them. The product website does say they are fine for glasses). The amount of moisture is just right for a quick clean and evaporate. It's always enough to get the gunk off, and I never need to dry anything off once I'm done cleaning. I keep a handful of the convenient little packs in various places so they're always handy when all my above things get gross.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Potter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Over the top of previous cleansing wipes. Perfect on glasses, iPhone screens even my watch face. Hard to believe how much less pressure it takes to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica b.

customer_reviews.title: Really does do a good job of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of solution in the wipe to clean a 15 inch laptop. Haven't used it on the desktop monitor as that never gets touched. They really do clean and have never left a streak and the screen dried pretty quickly. I generally use them on my Kindle as it gets pretty grungy. The only drawback was there were so many - bought them as they were the best bang for the buck so to speak but I really didn't need so many. I will say that after a long time the packets have kept their seal and I have never opened one to find it was dried out.
customer_reviews.author: FiberArtist

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these things!!!!! I find myself using them almost dailiy to remove all the dust, oils, gunk from my phone (as well as my kids' phones)! They even work well on my laptop and tablet. They dry out very quickly, so use it fast. This is a good thing though, because it does not leave your screen wet... it dries quickly without any smears at all. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Works, kinda
customer_reviews.text: I usually have to use two and there's very little solution on the cloths, but they do eventually work. I use them 90% for my glasses, 10% for my monitors. They streak my glasses on the first go and need a second cloth for clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol wipes
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed which I guess is my fault as I should have read the ingredients. I was disturbed when I realized the wipes just have rubbing alcohol in them which anyone has in their house and isn’t supposed to be used on iPhones. When used thr cloth to wipe my phone with a dry cloth since it left a smear after it dried.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Figueiredo

customer_reviews.title: 99% Good
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using these, but they seem to do a fine job of cleaning. I use a bulk cleaner most of the time, but I'll take these on the road. One tiny detail - these wipes are packaged in tear-off strips of three wipes. That means that the box actually contains 99 wipes, not 100. So they're 99% good.
customer_reviews.author: jiminmd

customer_reviews.title: they do the job
customer_reviews.text: This was my third try for wipes that can keep my laptop clean, keyboard and screen, and these do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret King

customer_reviews.title: iCloth for Touchscreens, Eyeglasses, CDs, and DVDs
customer_reviews.text: The iCloth wipes work very well. They remove finger prints without streaking or lint, and are convenient to use. After wiping my phone, I turn the cloth around, and use if for my eyeglasses. And since I've just learned that they are good for CDs and DVDs, I'll be using the wipes for those as well. The only thing that bothers me slightly, is the fact that they're probably not the most environmentally responsible product because they're individually wrapped and disposable. However this being said, I don't think there's an alternative method that would clean as effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Not So Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on a recommendation, whish I would have ordered ZI €$ lens cleaners. These do not really clenched my glasses, they leave streaks and a film. Will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes for laptop screen, keys, touchpad, and Gunnar lenses
customer_reviews.text: I tried these, then tried another brand, then came back to these. I love them. First, they do the job really well, removing all the dirt while leaving no smudges or smears. Second, they don't damage anything. Third, they're made in the USA, which I really appreciate. Some comments say the wipes should be bigger or wetter. No. They're just right. But if it's been a while since you cleaned your stuff, just use two. A trustworthy product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: H. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. Stick to your old cleaner
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I still prefer my Monster bottle cleaner with the soft microfiber cloth. The wipes are an interesting idea and they are not that terrible but I feel that they leave streaks on the screen occasionally and tend to attract dust and dirt fairly quickly. I am going to go back to the liquid cleaner after using these up. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of 100 regular iCloth wipes however the seller was out of stock and substituted the Avionics version. I like them a lot!! With one cloth and in a few minutes I cleaned the iPad, eyeglasses, and 50" LCD television. Really quick, easy, and nothing left behind. I can finally clean my eyewear in one wipe and they are crystal clear. The seller says the Avionics version is slightly wetter so if you think the regular iCloths are not wet enough give the Avionics version a try. Best new product I have tried in a long while. I can think of a 100 uses for the iCloth
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Arledge

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Effective
customer_reviews.text: These handy disposable wipes are so easy and do such a good job that I now keep them in perpetual supply. Every morning I use one to clean my much-used iPad screen, then use the same wipe for my eyeglasses and sunglasses. So nice to start the day clean and clear. The wipes have just the right amount of dampness to clean well but leave absolutely no residue. They require a lot less effort than using micro cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Noble

customer_reviews.title: Just Alcohol Wipes–Streaky; Not Real Screen Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: These are just sealed alcohol wipes. They streak your screen and are not worth it at all. I should have returned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marks

customer_reviews.title: iCloths - small
customer_reviews.text: I left a review prior but it wasn’t added. Item iC100. These cloths were too dry. Only smeared what was on the glass. Seemed to be outdated and the alcohol dried out. Follow up: I was contacted by iCloth reference my review on this date. They have told me that they are sending me a new box free of charge. Super response by them. Customer response was excellent. I look forward to receiving the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: W. Daily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these handy cleaning wipes! I have tried many other brands and this one beats all the others by far! They are each individually wrapped, the perfect size with just enough moisture on them...not too dry and not too wet. They clean fantastic! I at first was reluctant about getting 100 of them but now I am so glad I did. I clean my iPad, smartphone, sunglasses and glasses with these. I throw them in my purse, laptop carrier, car and in my pockets. They never dry out. They are so convenient. I don't have to try any other cleaners, the icloth is my pick from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I have found for cleaning my IPad and computer screen. I have tried many others, and this cleaned my screen and computer screen the best yet. Don’t dry out as quickly as others.
customer_reviews.author: Carmie Egger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for cleaning an iPhone 7 and an Otterbox ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for cleaning an iPhone 7 and an Otterbox Defender Case. It is.unbelievable that dirt gets inside the case, between the iPhone screen and the inside of the Otterbox glass case, but it does. Cleaning the case inside and the iPhone with these wipes restored the visual clarity of the phone and the case to "as new" condition. Of course these wipes are also good for cleaning eye glasses and computer monitors.
customer_reviews.author: michael j moses

customer_reviews.title: They Get the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: They seem to do a decent job of cleaning various surfaces. I have used them on my laptop screen, phone and glasses. Cleaning is thorough and streak free if you take the time to clean carefully. I would have given them 5 stars had they been a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Mis

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient moisture.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these wipes but I was a little disappointed. The actual cloth used is not terrible but the wipes are not very moist which basically renders the wipes useless unless you add your own liquid cleaner. And by the way these are basically just isopropyl alcohol. That's it. Would've been fine if they were just a little more moist. I'll be giving these away. Nice packaging and nice size and quality of wipes but really not enough alcohol to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: residue residue residue
customer_reviews.text: Product is convenient and works reasonably well on screens. However, for eyeglasses it leaves a residue that needs to be cleaned with a dry microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: TRS.

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money, but leaves small streaks
customer_reviews.text: These are OK. These wipes attracted me because they are pretty affordable for the quantity you get. When using them I find they leave some streaks to whatever surface I'm cleaning, which means I have to go over it with a dry microfibre cloth to get the full shine. Not terrible, but I've used other cleaning wipes that don't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: tnv98765431

customer_reviews.title: Handy Screen Cleaner For Computer, iPad, Cell Phone And/Or Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really handy product for cleaning the screens of your computer, iPad, cell phone and/or tablet. Try cleaning your GPS screen in your car as well. You can carry these packets anywhere. The only problem I found was that occasionally some of the packets were dry when I opened them. BTW I sometimes use these for quickly cleaning dust from my desk lamp, keyboard and printer.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily64

customer_reviews.title: convenience that works
customer_reviews.text: these small wipes are wonderful! One cleaned my monitor which had resisted my microfiber clothes. They have cleaned my eye glasses and phone and my kindle with no streaks. I have a few in my pocketbook and more in my desk. I have shared them with my daughters and they like them as much as I do. The package is small enough to fit into my wallet. In other words I enjoy owning them!
customer_reviews.author: MBV31

customer_reviews.title: Effective & convenient to usr
customer_reviews.text: Safe product to use. Convenient to use a carry with you
customer_reviews.author: betty kobata

customer_reviews.title: ... just got them today and the first one worked great. No streaking
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today and the first one worked great. No streaking, even on a 3M privacy filter. That has been a problem before. I'll update this if I find problems later on. The more I use them, the more I like them. So convenient. OK, I feel a bit bad about the environmental aspect of the single packs... my bad, but they are really handy and I don't waste a bunch of wipes because they dry out much faster in bulk.These are also perfect for travel, which I do frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Good product, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I have used these wipes to clean computer monitor screens and smartphone screens. These moist wipes have the right amount of moisture to do the job and don't leave streaks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Linford

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning pc monitor, almost anything.
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are not moist as I thought they would be. However, they did get rid of the grimes on my pc monitor. They are great for cleaning it-- streak-free, lint-free. I also used it to wipe my reading glasses. I love them. I recommend them to my family and friends. I would buy them again. Update: I bought them again. They are a necessity for a clean pc monitor. I clean my computer and my keyboard with them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Raynette T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Portable packaging.  Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: 1-2-3 go. Easy to use. Does the job on TV, pad, phone and laptop screens. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Debra E. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike so far, product performs as advertised. I especially appreciate that it is not as wet as competing products, so my MacBook Air screen can be cleaned quickly without the need for drying.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pendrick

customer_reviews.title: Wipes dried out when opening new packages
customer_reviews.text: I took out three packages to use as soon the package arrived. First one is about 80% dry out, second package is complete dry out, the third package is about 80% dry out as well. I am very disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Wei hu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This wipes do what they say they going to do. Clean your screens. I use for my iPhone, my computer monitor. I also use to clean my keyboard, my phone. They work! Sometimes more than one is needed for a large item, for example if my monitor is very dirty or I haven't cleaned it for a while, I need to use 2 clothes. Also, got a nice email from the seller making sure I was happy with the product and asking me to contact them if I wasn't happy for any reason - nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Denise F

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a product that will safely clean my numerous electronic device screens. I purchased other wipes just to find out they weren't necessarily safe for my devices. This product, the " iCloth" cleans all my devices streak free and with ease. I like the individual packets. I stash a few in every device case so I have them with me when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Wipes do a Nice Job Cleaning Screens.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes do a very nice job on my wife's and my mobile devices. My device is in an Otterbox and has a large screen that picks-up oils from my face and hands. I do not like the smudges and oil lines on the screen protector and these wipes clean the screen protector very well. We can usually clean both our phones with one wipe. Made in USA too!!
customer_reviews.author: Foodlaw

customer_reviews.title: Clean Great
customer_reviews.text: I work in an art foundry in the wax department and always have wax and oil on my hands, these work great at keeping my screens clean. I use them on my iphone and ipad, they seem small at first, however, one is all it takes to clean up even my waxy smudges. I have them at home, work and carry a few in my purse. They also work great after a visit from my sticky fingered grand-kids. Can't say enough about how well the work! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cleaning cloths. And convenient, too.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little cleaners. They're individually packaged which makes them easy to throw in my purse or pocket for cleaning sunglasses and reading glasses. I also used them for my smartphone and my computer screens. Fantastic. So I shared the goodness and gave some to my friend for her very smudged cell phone screen. She loved it and wanted to know where to get them. Amazon, of course.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: and they gave me one and I tried it and absolutely fell in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers actually use this at their job, and they gave me one and I tried it and absolutely fell in love with this product. My coworkers by the way are commercial pilots. I'm a flight attendant and now I've bought and these for my devices including my laptop computer and this product is flawless I really really recommend it. Let's think about it if Delta Airlines buys these for the pilots to clean their instruments in the flight deck, you know it's got to be a pretty damn good item.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great, convenient item
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to read almost all day on an IPad. Because of the touch screen I'm always reading through a blur. These wipes do the trick. They make cleaning my iPad and iPhone quick and convenient. I keep the packets in my desk, purse, family room, kitchen and home office.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: If You Want a Clean Screen...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I hate more than a dirty screen on my laptop. So I was excited to receive this mega-box of iCloth wipes. A few other reviewers noted that the cloths feel somewhat dry when you open them. This is true, but they still work well. Be aware that they have a somewhat strong odor of rubbing alcohol when you use them. If you're sensitive, then use them in a ventilated area. Also, love that they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Green Lover

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was seated next to a gal on a very delayed plane, last week. She used this wipe...it did such a beautiful job! I ordered it while I was sitting there, had it delivered in two days! My phone and iPad have never been so clean and streak free!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I cloth wipe and cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Dry easy to use. I carry a couple with me so I can clean on the go.
customer_reviews.author: ebook reader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cloths.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these cloths for years and love them. They do a perfect job cleaning all electronics. I also use on my glasses. The small pouches are great for travel, car, office, purse ... Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: Dry, useless wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Worst "moist" wipes I've ever used. These are so dry they are useless. You can smell the rubbing alcohol when you open the package, but the wipes are so dry you have to use 3 or 4 to clean a laptop screen. I'm starting to see why they come in such huge numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Much better than most.....
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several brands of electronic wipes. Some leave display surface looking worse than prior to cleaner, primarily because of streaking. Most say streak free and it just ain't so. iCloth wipes contain just enough liquid cleaner to get the job done with minimal to no streaking. Much better product than most
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Dad

customer_reviews.title: iCloth Wipes are the Best!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work great! I ran out of them and I was using a different product given to me, and they didn't work nearly as good. I had to use 2 or 3 towels to get my laptop screen or my glasses clean. My laptop screen had a lot of residual smears and crap on it, and the iCloths really cleaned it good right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: we prefer individual packs like this to keep in our desk drawers
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. My office of 22 people all use screen wipes, but rather than pass a canister around, we prefer individual packs like this to keep in our desk drawers. The office supply vendor my company uses only sells screen wipes in canisters, so we took a chance on these are very happy. They are sealed well, so each cloth is moist. They are also very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Emily's Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I always have my phone out at the gym. I set down on the floor, mats, treadmill. Not to mention I obviously touch all the equipment and then my phone. By the time i'm done my phone is very scuffed with my fingerprints. Not to mention all the gross stuff thats on there that eye cannot see. These wipes are perfectly moist. They do not streak at all and leave my phone nice and clean
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Simply, A Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: These are really fantastic. I love the individual packaging - I just throw them in my bag, a couple in my kiddo's backpack, and a few in hubby's briefcase. I even leave a few in our cars. I happily give them to others when I find myself using them in front of friends, too. Work really well - no smearing and efficient! I find myself using them about two or three times a week. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sandi Wolff

customer_reviews.title: The amount of moisture is perfect - enough to clean without worrying about damage from ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my laptop and iphone. On the laptop, I clean both the screen and the keypad. These wipes are packaged in a convenient size so you can keep some at home and some at the office - or even in your purse if you want to have them on the go. The amount of moisture is perfect - enough to clean without worrying about damage from too much liquid. The seller even went above and beyond by upping my package size when what I ordered wasn't available. It's rare to get that kind of customer service anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: iCloth Screen Cleaning Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I kept reading about how dirty smartphones are so I searched Amazon for a way to clean them. I love the iCloth Screen Cleaning Wipes as it takes away all the fingerprints left on the phone. I actually shared some with a co-worked who was delighted to get them. Nice to have a product that I can easily take with me as each cloth is wrapped individually.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona A. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: ... was going to give this product one star but hate is such a strong word
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this product one star but hate is such a strong word. I know that you should expect for these to be dry but I felt like the box I purchased has been sitting around on a shelf for years and they just shipped them to me. They are way to dry and my students could not really use them without me spraying the cleaning liquid I had on them. I was very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monarch

customer_reviews.title: No more smears on cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product because my cell phone screen never looked clean. My makeup smeared on the front and even the microfiber cloth did not clean it completely. I wanted to have something save to use on my electronic devices. When I first tried the wipes, my screen was so clean and free of smears, it looked like it did when it was new. I then used it on my computer screen with the same result. It does not have a wet feel to the wipe but it really does a great job. I asked some friends at work to try it and they all liked it and had the same experience. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaking on my glasses
customer_reviews.text: I almost always have to wipe my glasses off on my shirt after using these. They almost always leave a streaky film behind. I gave 2 stars because they are super wet and clean well, just not good enough to look through
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my glasses better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: I buy these over and over. Good for glasses and my phone. My iPad is large and gets a bit more skin oil, so I need 2 of this size.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheJules

customer_reviews.title: Icloth = I-useless
customer_reviews.text: These pads are not wet enough to do the job--are very dry. Sadly they were useless and a waste of money..
customer_reviews.author: R. Gottesman

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had seen these referred to in some non-shopping web article. I got them for everybody at Christmas. They have been wonderful for me to use to clean my iPhone. They work exceptionally well. No streaking.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Saucer Writer

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are really amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very rarely do I go back after the fact to praise a product, but these are worth it. They do the best job of cleaning the screen on my laptop of any product I've ever tried. The only thing that I've found is that you can't do more than 1 screen with a wipe, and sometimes you need 2 wipes. Well done !!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Linty
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are convenient, but they leave quite a bit of lint on the screen. They also don't cut through the grease and clean screens and lenses as quickly as I hoped they would (it takes a lot of wiping to get a truly clean screen.) That said, I cleaned my phone, glasses, laptop screen, and secondary monitor all with one wipe, so they do have enough cleanser to go around.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Heart

customer_reviews.title: Too dry in many instances to be useful!
customer_reviews.text: at least 1/2 of the wipes I have opened have been too dry to be of any use in cleaning a screen. I wish I had opened more of them more when they were in the window for a return. I do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jwn999

customer_reviews.title: Not sure they disinfect phone
customer_reviews.text: Some of the packets were dry. Not sure how well they disinfect my phone
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: What are the ingredients?
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly well. But for something that cleans very expensive devices, I would expect the ingredients on the package. Presumably this is alcohol and water. Here's the thing: water is bad for electronic devices. So it would be nice to know what the exact ratio is of alcohol to water.
customer_reviews.author: Roger from New York

customer_reviews.title: Great, no streak cleaning product for my iPhone 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, no streak cleaning product for my iPhone 6 plus. I don't like fingerprints and I don't want the protective screen so I use these at least once a day (over 100 cleanings so far) and I'm very satisfied with the result. The vendor delivered the product on time and my experience has been hassle free both times that I have purchased iCloths. I will purchase them again from Devonshire Ltd.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not too wet!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got these in this time of the Corona virus. The wipes are not too wet and don’t leave streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen M. O'connor

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it was shipped and the way the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product work very well for me .I like the way it was shipped and the way the product worked itself .my family uses it on our laptops on our cell phones and tablets .the way these things are individually rap you just tear one off wipe and go .family of 3 don't have to go look for the bottle of cleaner and cloth very convenient for my family. would recommend .and will purchase agan.
customer_reviews.author: pierre

customer_reviews.title: Fair wipes for eyeglasses and iPhone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was the smell of alcohol but it fades away fast. Cleaned my glasses excellent my iPhone excellent same with every thing I have tried them on. Excellent results I recommend and I paid for them myself!!!!
customer_reviews.author: willyloughran69

customer_reviews.title: Kind of dry; still work great.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are drier that I expected, but they work very well even so. One wipe cleaned my computer screen, iPad, Kindle, and phone. By then it really was drying out and didn’t do a very good job on my glasses. But I’d say these wipes are great; they got my devices sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...gets phone, laptop, fit bit, and kindle screens sparkling clean, quickly. Individual packets assures that cloths do not dry out and make them easy to carry in purses, briefcases, laptop bags or just in the car for immediate use all the time, anywhere. Highly recommend iCloth Wipes. I gave a few boxes away to friends and have been told by the recipients that they love them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the i cloth wipes! I have used other cleaners before for my electronics, but these wipes are terrific! They do what they say there going to do, they do not leave streaks either! I use them on everything that's glass! I will definitely order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased with this purchase ! When I learned that there is a cleaner for our phones I grabbed it immediately!! My grand babies play games on my phone and afterwards my phone feels grimy and this cloth works perfectly ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gotte

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin, so my phone and tablet screens are typically disgusting. These are the only product that has worked. Carrying around liquid cleaners and reusable cloths is cumbersome and leaky. The individually wrapped, pre-moistened wipes are extremely convenient, and at 20 cents a piece I don't feel like I'm throwing my money away with every cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake Loy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. My husband had purchased another product previously. When I read the reviews and product info on this product prior to purchasing, inferior products were mentioned. I honestly didn't think it would make a difference. It did make a difference! These are great. They can be used all all my products from iPhone to iPad to computers and sunglasses. I've even used them to clean my dash and GPS screen in the car. I would buy this again. I can tell the difference in the this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Better than Brand-named
customer_reviews.text: Having used brand named wipes in the past, I wasn't sure what to expect from a lesser known product at a substantially lower price. However I was immediately impressed with the first wipe. I was able to clean my phone, tablet AND glasses. This wouldn't have been the case with my former wipes. I am extremely happy and will definitely reorder more when I finish this box. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pri Vet

customer_reviews.title: Stays moist, very fluffy, overall excellent screen wipes.
customer_reviews.text: These screen cleaning wipes are excellent. They are very fluffy and seem to capture a lot of dust. They also stay moist in their own individual wrappers. They are a much better deal than the canister-o-screen-wipes unless you have an entire office worth of screens to wipe in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D. Hamma

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This unit does not do what it describes iam very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I once was dirty but now, I am clean.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work very well for all of my electronic devices. I especially like that they are each individually packaged for portability and they stay moist in their pouches. I am in college learning to be a software developer so I commonly have my laptop, tablet and smartphone on my desk for a 3 screen type of multitasking. Electronic devices are magnets for dust and the touch screens collect a great deal of dirt and oil from your fingertips. These wipes are very effective at gently removing all three without harming your device.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Read the Directions
customer_reviews.text: Read the Directions I started to use the cloths and was not impressed smears galore. After reading the help information and learning NOT to go in a circular motion and pull in a constant straight line this way the cloths really do as promised I have used them on a soft tablet screen, a hard display on my DSLR and on glasses as well as my TV's all work excellently
customer_reviews.author: Al Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job at protecting my Mac laptop screen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these wipes for the past couple of years - Mac laptops experience mid-screen degradation from closing the hit and resting on the hand oils on the space bar / these wipes help to slow the screen wear - I’ll only use these on my computer screen!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are unquestionably the best wipes I have ever used for my iPad, iPad pro and iPhone, as well as my eyeglasses. The paper is just right. The cleaning agent (smells like alcohol) works without smearing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these pads for all you household screen cleaning needs
customer_reviews.text: This are very sturdy and don't fall apart. The cleaning pads have all been wet when I open the packet. Other brands I have used the pads were dry and I had to use another cleaner to re wet them. I really like iCloth cleaning pads for cleaning my iMac, Tablets, phones and even my families glasses since they can't seem to tell they are dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: I found them pretty dry and not a good value
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for these wipes. I found them pretty dry and not a good value. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Chaim Yonkel

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not enough value to re-order for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were great & convenient to have in my bag while they lasted but price isn't worth the value for me to re-order. I'll go back to using a spray cleaner with a paper towel for the same result with the current price on these.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Cleaning Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cleaning wipes. I just finished using one on my laptop screen, very easy and convenient to use. They are all individually wrapped making it unlikely any will dry out before you run out. That has happened to me before with the wipes that are packed in a pull-up container.
customer_reviews.author: JLL

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Cleaning Wipe for Screens!
customer_reviews.text: These little cloths do the best job of cleaning a screen that I have ever experienced. They quickly do away with oily fingerprints and leave no residue. They happen to be the same cloths that are given to us by our company to clean our screens in our plane. If you need this sort of product, look no farther!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes.You think they might need a little bit more liquid but it's just enough so that the cleaning solution isn't running down your screen. I use it on my phones, laptop, television. Although I can't tell you if that is safe or not. One caveat to the seller. I am not sure how the pricing works but when I went to buy them again, they had gone up in price substantially. Luckily by then time I checked out, it had gone down. I wouldn't have bought them at the higher Price.
customer_reviews.author: jdmatador2

customer_reviews.title: Wipe Out
customer_reviews.text: These are really just big alcohol wipes, albeit with a better-quality fabric. Well packaged and there are a lot of them. If you find alcohol a suitable cleaner for your screen then these are great. If you need another kind of cleaner to work on your particular screen surface, then the product perhaps is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Screen cleaner - keep some at home, the office and in the car
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They work well and really leave a clean screen
customer_reviews.author: JM
